mapper.update: DROP TEMPORARY TABLE IF EXISTS temp_main;
DROP TEMPORARY TABLE IF EXISTS temp_side_set;
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_main AS SELECT * FROM matsuya_menus WHERE category IN ('定食', '丼', 'カレー', '牛めし') AND price <= #{priceLimit} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1;
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_side_set AS SELECT * FROM matsuya_menus WHERE category IN ('サイドメニュー', 'セットメニュー') ORDER BY RAND();
